attributes.action: Ask Masterfoods not to use animal rennet in it's chocolate products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Masterfoods has changed the recipe of it's chocolate, which since the 1st May includes animal rennet. This makes products including Mars, Twix, Snickers, Bounty, Minstrals, Milky Way, and Maltesers no longer suitable for vegetarians.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
